mean_cn: n. 污染物质，污染源；  adj. 造成污染的，受污染的
mean_en: a substance that makes land, water, air, etc., dirty and not safe or suitable to use :something that causes pollution
word_etyma: pollut 污染+ ant 表示物，…剂 → pollutant n. 污染物
sentence: Airborne pollutants can damage public health and cause global warming.
sentence_trans: 空气漂浮的污染物不但危害公众健康，还会造成全球变暖。
